content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed "average.py" again and got the message "The average of the numbers is: 3.0". Attempted "get_hyperlinks" but it failed due to returning too much output. I created a new file "new_file.txt" with "write_to_file" and deleted it with "delete_file". I read the contents of "productive_things_to_do.txt" and appended "- Practice mindfulness and meditation." to it. Then I replaced the first occurrence of "Practice mindfulness and meditation." with "Practice mindfulness, meditation, and yoga." in the same file. Finally, I deleted "productive_things_to_do.txt". I read the contents of "productive_things_to_do.txt" and found a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored, emphasizing the importance of rest and relaxation, and encouraging readers to try new things and improve themselves. I appended "- Learn a new language!" and "- Learn a new musical instrument!" to the file. I replaced the first occurrence of "Practice mindfulness and meditation." with "Practice mindfulness, meditation, and yoga." in the same file. I then deleted "productive_things_to_do.txt".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "featured_article.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: The current featured article on Wikipedia is about the short-beaked echidna, a species of echidna found in Australia and eastern New Guinea. It is covered in fur and spines, has a distinctive snout, and uses a specialized tongue to catch insects. The article also discusses its behavior, mating habits, and threats to its population. Other sections of the page include news updates, recently featured articles, and information about Wikipedia itself.', type='action_result')]
"""
